It has action-packed scenes, plus explores the theme of seeking lost treasures or answers. Starring Johnny Depp, Tom Hollander, andPenelope Cruz, this movie is sure to captivate your interest.

conversation.text: I recommend 'Born on the Fourth of July' since it tells the inspiring story of Ron Kovic, a Vietnam War veteran who becomes an anti-war activist after being paralyzed by his own country's conflict.
